tool.name: Gdal_Grid
tool.description: Computes a regular grid (raster) from scattered data read from a vector data source.
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py output_data_OutputedDataSourceName $output_data_OutputedDataSourceName name Gdal_Grid OF '$OF' InputDSN '$InputDSN' OutputDSN '$OutputDSN' prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OutputedDataSourceName '$OutputSection_OutputedDataSourceName.outputType_OutputedDataSourceName' transmissionMode_OutputedDataSourceName $OutputSection_OutputedDataSourceName.transmissionMode_OutputedDataSourceName

param.name: InputDSN
param.label: The input data source name
param.help: The input data source name to use as source for convertion.

param.name: OutputDSN
param.label: The output data source name
param.help: The output data source name to use as source for convertion.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OutputedDataSourceName
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_OutputedDataSourceName
param.label: The resulting converted file
param.help: The file name resulting of the convertion
